description_html:
Designer Kim Tyler’s Chas Chair has turned the slipper chair into a sculptural and inspirational nod to mid-century design, with felted knitted wool fabric, that beckons one to stay seated and bask in the softness of natural fiber.

The colors of the fabric are bold and hot in hues; the design organic and fluid. The solid maple frame effortlessly suspends the upholstered seat; the back of the chair, an abstracted human form. The craftsmanship of Bespoke by Luigi Gentile brought forth the vision of Kim Tyler’s design.

The designer, the manufacturer, and textile mill are all located in the tri-state area supporting the Made in America movement. The chair can be made in other solid woods and adaptable in COM/COL creating different moods while never loosing the essence of the sculptural design or it’s inherent whimsy.

Dimensions: 24”w x 28”d x 32”h; seat height 17”.
product_name: Chas Chair by Kim Tyler Designs
